quote: What I’ve enjoyed the most about being President of Design at UCI is seeing how much the club has been making a name for itself, on campus and around the country. More and more students are becoming interested in learning about design, and I’m so proud to be a part of an organization that fulfills this need in accessible ways.
name: Hannah Limary, President

quote: As Marketing Director, I work with all of the board committees to coordinate our marketing strategy, social media content, copywriting, outreach, and analytics. Plus, I still get to have fun with whatever I’m working on, whether it be creating quirky newsletter comics or taking part in behind-the-scenes photoshoot shenanigans!
name: Carly Chan, Marketing Director

quote: As Marketing Coordinator, I handle social media posts and plan outreach for our events! What I’ve enjoyed the most about being a part of the design board is the community and the people themselves. I’ve formed many friendships with those interested in the same career path as me (UX/UI Design), thus we are able to motivate and help one another!
name: Jolin Huang, Marketing Coordinator

quote: My favorite part about being a Workshop Coordinator is being able to share a diverse range of topics with our design community. I especially love the processes of curating workshop content and sourcing industry speakers!
name: Meghna Kaligotla, Workshop Coordinator

quote: Serving on board has allowed me to meet tons of individuals from UCI’s design community all while providing them the resources they need to grow as designers! This year has been so fulfilling and I’m glad to be part of a community like Design at UCI :D! H.A.G.S
name: Vivian Chu, Workshop Coordinator

quote: Being a PT Coordinator is so rewarding because it gives me the opportunity to mentor students, help them learn fundamental design skills, and provide them with hands-on experience in a positive, collaborative environment!
name: Sonali Chellappa, PT Coordinator

quote: I love being able to work with creative individuals to plan events that will foster closer relationships between club members. My favorite memory so far is being able to hang out with all the board members for dinner!
name: Jorina Chen, Social Coordinator

quote: The most rewarding part of being on the board as a social coordinator has been watching other members get closer to one another through social events. It’s really heartwarming to see all the friendships that have been made and strengthened, including some of my own.
name: Sunny Stetsyuk, Social Coordinator

quote: what I like about finance-working with other coordinators to organize a fun event, and seeing cool people come and hang out at our events
name: Michael Chang, Financial Chair

quote: Being a graphic designer for design@uci has been an insightful experience! Not only have I learned a lot of skills from other designers to incorporate into my graphics, I also learned how important it is to be mindful of accessibility when designing to increase inclusivity!
name: Isabel Pham, Creative Director

quote: I love being a graphic designer for design@uci because I really get to let my creativity flow in a fun and productive way! I also got to meet so many cool and talented people with strong passions for design like me!!
name: Karla Avalos, Graphic Designer

quote: I have a strong passion for designing and developing beautiful, interactive interfaces and being the webmaster allows me to not only work with the most talented people at UCI, but also grow personally as a designer.
name: Ryan Yang, Webmaster
